name: CreateCustomField
description:
Create a new custom field in the system.

Use this tool to add a custom field to your database or application configuration. It allows for extending the available data fields to include additional, personalized information.

parameters.name: custom_field_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details such as label, type, object type, default values, and selection options for the custom field.

default_value.description: The default value for single-valued custom fields.

default_values.description: The default values for multi-valued custom fields.

description.description: The description of the custom field.

label.description: The label of the custom field.

object_type.description: The object type of the custom field. Can be "account", "issue", or "contact"

select_options.description: The list options of the select custom field. This is only present for select and multiselect custom fields.

slug.description: The slug of the custom field.

type.description: The type of the custom field. Can be one of `text`, `number`, `decimal`, `boolean`, `date`, `datetime`, `user`, `url`, `select`, or `multiselect`.
